definition: to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)

sentences.english: All images by Koichi Mitsui Koichi Mitsui is a professional photographer in Japan. When he's not on the job shooting for magazines and ads, he wanders around Tokyo taking pictures with his iPhone 3GS.
sentences.chinese: 三井光一是日本一位專業攝影師。

sentences.english: Mr Tait also acted as the official photographer.
sentences.chinese: 泰特先生還擔當了官方攝影師的職責。

sentences.english: She eventually chose a photographer as her date on the show.
sentences.chinese: 最終，馬諾在節目裏選擇了一名攝影師約會。

sentences.english: Once there were two female colleague manage a wedding want to please a photographer.
sentences.chinese: 一次有二個女同事辦喜事想請一位攝影師。

sentences.english: For generations of photojournalists working in the middle of the action, a Leica camera was that tool.
sentences.chinese: 對於幾代紀實攝影師來說，徠卡正是這樣的利器。

sentences.english: Food photographers also use tricks to prolong the life of the food.
sentences.chinese: 食物攝影師也使用些技巧來延長食物的壽命。

sentences.english: Also in the front row were the photographer and videographer.
sentences.chinese: 另外在前排就坐的還有攝影師和電視錄像製作人。

sentences.english: jpgAll images by Koichi Mitsui Koichi Mitsui is a professional photographer in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 三井光一是日本一位專業攝影師。

sentences.english: McBroom, a photographer, snapped the image that made Farrah Fawcett an icon.
sentences.chinese: 一名攝影師，拍下了形象，法拉福西特圖標。

sentences.english: But the bravest photographers and cameramen take reckless risks.
sentences.chinese: 而那些最勇敢的攝影師和攝像師們卻甘冒極度的危險。

sentences.english: The female videographer who had been on the announcement tour was not going to travel with him again.
sentences.chinese: 誰的女攝影師對旅遊已被宣佈不打算再與他一起旅行。

sentences.english: Both photographer and subject form part of the group of 30 visually impaired or blind people learning photography with the help of the Mexico City foundation Ojos Que Sienten, or Eyes That Feel.
sentences.chinese: 攝影師及被攝者均參加了“感覺的眼睛”攝影工作坊。

sentences.english: Yuan Tian, a 25-year-old photographer in Shanghai, has a 1-year-old daughter.
sentences.chinese: 25歲的上海攝影師原田只有1個1歲大的女兒。

sentences.english: In the gray-toned shadow of the objective world contains the photographer's gaze.
sentences.chinese: 在灰色影調中蘊含着攝影師對客觀世界的凝視。

sentences.english: The portfolio of Fabio Lana, a 22 year old photographer based in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 拉娜的法比奧，一個22歲的攝影師在意大利的組合。

sentences.english: Projects are shown in full-color photographs from noted architectural photographers.
sentences.chinese: 彩色圖片全部出自著名建築攝影師之手。

definition: to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
